content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”masonry-portfolio location-portfolio” css=”.vc_custom_1563615609227{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515636297694{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-6″]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-6″]

Our Unique Small Business Website Development Process

If you are looking for a web design agency near Melbourne, particularly for your business in Elwood, Confetti Design is the best choice there is. It’s time to grow your local business by creating a stunning website that will cater to more customers. We at Confetti Design ensure that your website gives the best user experience! It may be for your ecommerce website design or for your brick-and-mortar business that is ready for expansion – Confetti Design partners up with you and your Elwood business to achieve the results you’re eyeing for.

[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]VIEW MORE OF OUR WORK[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1513007553262{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep”][vc_column]
[vc_column_text el_class=”text-not-caps”]

Confetti Design services in Elwood

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564527601875{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

We will help you build your e-commerce website from ground up. Our retail and e-commerce experience is invaluable in helping your business be a success.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_empty_space height=”65px”]

[vc_row_inner el_class=”services-location”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Web Design

[vc_column_text]Looking for good designers and professional developers? Confetti Design offers a hands on design and development Service that will help you accomplish an amazing client experience resulting in great conversions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Branding

[vc_column_text]We provide more than just website development, your branding matters and we can ensure you present a consistent online brand. Making sure all your customer touch-points present the same brand messaging and visuals is our passion.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

SEO

[vc_column_text]Getting your site within the first 3 positions on the first page of Google is every businesses goal. We ensure your website goes live with best practise optimisation and then if you are serious about ranking we can help. Our SEO partner is the best Melbourne based Search Engine Optimisation company we know.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Shopify Developer

[vc_column_text]Shopify is one of the best platforms for e-commerce, no doubt and we are the right people to help you with your online business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563758744245{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}” el_class=”location-slider-portfolio”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1563592372523{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

3 Key principles in creating call-to-action (CTA) buttons for your Elwood website

[vc_column_text]

 A call to action (CTA) button is a small section of a small business website design which directs the visitors to what you want them to do next. It can be a button, a hyperlink, or sometimes an image that has the URL of the page you want your visitors to see next, like a registration page or the products you offer from your Elwood business. Confetti Design’s vast experience in WordPress and ecommerce website design gives you the confidence that we strategically position your CTA buttons in your website, aiming for the most optimal results.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

CTAs are pivotal to the success of your business website in Elwood as they turn your “spectators” to “life-long customers.” We at Confetti Design do not just create pretty websites, but we also consider the importance of these small but impactful areas of your e-commerce website design. Give us a call now and let’s get started!

Here are 3 key principles in creating our CTA buttons that we’ve compiled for you.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1563603813437{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-white steps location-factors”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608564696{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_01.jpg?id=10889) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg1 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564527729987{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Compel your audience

Since we are talking about a button that will convert your visitors to customers for your business website, creating a compelling content that will make them click that button is essential. Build a connection with your audience, then present a problem that you have solutions for. Make your content interesting enough that your audience will be interested to click that button.

When you partner with the best website design company near Elwood which is Confetti Design, we offer guidance on how to build that anticipation to your target audience, hence making them compelled to click that button.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608572404{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_02.jpg?id=10890) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg2 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564527803340{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Situate your CTA strategically

When you put your CTA buttons at the correct areas of your website, your audience will understand its use and its significance. Consider how your audience browse through your website. In a normal setting, your audience will scan through a page section from the upper left part to the upper right, then lower left to lower right—as this is the normal reading behavior. But since your audience is technically “scanning” and not really reading, you need to mix your content with images on the left side and put your important text on the upper right part of the page, then your CTA at the lower right part where attention is fixated.

Confetti Design can help you create just the right mix of images and text and situate your CTA accordingly and get more conversions for your Elwood business website.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608578524{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_03.jpg?id=10891) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg3 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564528082990{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Be mindful of your design

Your CTA should stand out from the rest of your page, but not too loud that your visitors might get intimidated or annoyed. Think about the colour that stands out but is still in line with your overall website theme. The font should also be noticeable but readable and straightforward. The size should be larger than the normal text of your website, but not too much that it overwhelms your customers specially when they are browsing on mobile.

We at Confetti Design can proudly say that we’ve been successfully designing CTAs for more than 5 years, and we can help your Elwood business website convert more visitors by creating CTAs that are not only eye catching but also makes an impact to your potential customers. We know the colour combination and typography that will perfectly suit your Elwood business’s overall theme.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563758715994{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563758698142{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564527981193{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Confetti Design caters to clients from Elwood, Beaumaris, Highett, and nearby areas. Our unparalleled web design and development services have proven to work with our clients!

Below are the small business web design testimonials from our valued clients.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”testimonial-location”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1563758667362{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

Stacey Currie

I had been quoted from $1k to $10k, I had no idea who to trust. Luckily I was referred by someone I trust 100%, who trust Johannah 100%, and I know why. I am very grateful.

Stacey Currie

I still can’t believe my vision is here; I feel extremely proud of my new website and branding. I felt embarrassed of my old branding but now I am so proud to share what Johannah and the team created.

Personal Brand Expert

One feature I loved was Johannah's availability and prompt response to any query no matter how big or small. Confetti's service is always with genuine smile and her positive attitude and outlook made the process fun!

Suzie Lightfoot

Coach Central

I am impressed with how well Johannah nailed my brief without one face-to-face meeting. I highly recommend her to create a website you will love.

Cindy Turner

Wedding Honey

Johannah has produced a beautiful and effective new website for our small business in a short amount of time. Her professionalism, kindness and encouragement is appreciated.

Ray & Sharon Tolcher

Miei Fiori

Johannah took her time to understand our vision before coming back with suggestions that not only meet our requirements but are relevant, current and forward in it's application.

Rob Greca & Lyly Greca

Sarah Trevathan Coach

The process has been stress-free and actually very enjoyable! I'm also delighted with the finished result of my website.

Sarah Trevathan

What's My Style

I regularly receive compliments on my branding, website and the stunning business cards and cannot recommend Johannah and Confetti Designs highly enough.

Nicky McMillan
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Contact us for an instant over-the-phone quote.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
